html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02742012-03-08,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActTax Court of Canada Act
SubjectTax Court of Canada ** 6 persons for administering oaths **
PrecisOrder advising that COMMISSIONS do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering six persons of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the TAX COURT OF CANADA.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Tax Court of Canada ** 6 persons for administering oaths **
precis: Order advising that COMMISSIONS do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering six persons of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the TAX COURT OF CANADA.
